item.title: P l e a s e r e a d!
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[quote=“rain1994, post:4, topic:347796”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=444178.msg3261345#msg3261345 date=1278526782]

You have to add the colors in to your server.

Wrong, the colors are completely client-sided.

@TOPIC - You actually have to enable colors for the server-message. (being used in the Yell command in this case) There is a tutorial somewhere on R-S, but I can’t help on finding the link.
[/quote]

ok so wait were would i find all that in the client-side? and how would i add the colors?like what s p i d a z said?[/quote]

client.java

if(l == 16) { //@red@ +msg
if(i1 > 0 && i1 < 120)
class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(0xff0000, aStringArray944[k], i1, 822, 0);
j++;
}

Elaborate on this.

Read full topic

item.title: P l e a s e r e a d!
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:347796”][quote author=s p i d a z link=topic=444178.msg3261344#msg3261344 date=1278526678]
You have to add the colors in to your server.
[/quote]
Wrong, the colors are completely client-sided.

@TOPIC - You actually have to enable colors for the server-message. (being used in the Yell command in this case) There is a tutorial somewhere on R-S, but I can’t help on finding the link.[/quote]

ok so wait were would i find all that in the client-side? and how would i add the colors?like what s p i d a z said?

Read full topic
item.source: P l e a s e r e a d!

item.title: P l e a s e r e a d!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

s p i d a z:

You have to add the colors in to your server.

Wrong, the colors are completely client-sided.

@TOPIC - You actually have to enable colors for the server-message. (being used in the Yell command in this case) There is a tutorial somewhere on R-S, but I can’t help on finding the link.

Read full topic
item.source: P l e a s e r e a d!

item.title: P l e a s e r e a d!
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

Can someone please post a tut on making ::yell with color I can’t figure it out and i’ve looked through the site and i found a few other people with the same problem.

[code=actionscript3]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Super player] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
	if (playerName.equals("Jason")) {
                titles = "[Owner]";
            }
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

On all the answers they say just do this add @gre@, or @blu@ ect right b4 the name like this

[code=abap]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@pur@[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@yel@[Administrator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@whi@[Co-Owner] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "@red@[Super player] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Player] ";
            }
	if (playerName.equals("Jason")) {
                titles = "@gre@[Owner]";
            }
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

When ever i do this this is all that happens in the game @gre@[owner] Jason-blah blah blah

Can someone help?

Read full topic
item.source: P l e a s e r e a d!
